DOC.brief_summary: The study aim evaluate chronic acute effect high-intensity resistance training blood pressure hemodynamic neural determinators healthy normotensive old subject .
DOC.brief_title: Chronic Acute Effects Resistance Exercise Older Subjects ' Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate chronic acute effect resistance train blood pressure hemodynamic neural determinators elderly , 24 healthy normotensive old subject randomly divide 2 group : train control . The trained group submit progressive high-intensity resistance training . Before 16 week , well , one training session , blood pressure ( clinic ambulatory ) , cardiac output ( CO2 rebreathing ) , autonomic modulation ( spectral analysis heart rate blood pressure variability ) measure
DOC.criteria: Age 60 80 year Normotensives Nonactive Cardiovascular disease Cardiovascular medication Orthopedic problem
